column1: NGR is from 1950s record and is near Brechfa. Altitudes nearly match, NGR might be 100m NNW.
Jan 1941 reading noted as being corrected for snow; left in this record
Apr and May 1952 and Feb and Oct 1954 are noted as being corrected for arithmetic and are in brackets. Not sure what this means; left in record
Jul and Aug 1957 are noted as being corrected for WD; no idea what this means and readings are not in brackets; left in record
